name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Delicious Italian pasta with creamy carbonara sauce.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Juicy chicken patty served in a soft bun with lettuce and mayo.

description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

description: Freshly grilled salmon served with steamed vegetables.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy and golden fries served with ketchup.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

description: Assorted sushi rolls including salmon, tuna, and California rolls.

name: Tomato Soup
description: Comforting tomato soup served with a side of garlic bread.

name: T-Bone Steak
description: Juicy T-bone steak cooked to perfection and served with mashed potatoes.

description: Refreshing mango smoothie made with fresh mango and yogurt.

name: Vegetarian Wrap
description: Wrap filled with grilled vegetables, hummus, and greens.

description: Crusty bread topped with garlic butter and parsley.

name: Lobster Roll
description: Delectable lobster meat served in a toasted roll with butter.

name: Onion Rings
description: Crispy onion rings served with a tangy dipping sauce.

description: Creamy alfredo sauce tossed with tender chicken and fettuccine pasta.
